entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
